bible.derived: Hebrew Masoretic Text, Hebrew and Aramaic New Testament sources.

translations.name: Messianic Aleph Tav Scriptures
translations.description: The Messianic Aleph Tav Scriptures ?? (MATS) is a study bible which focuses on the study of the Aleph Tav character symbol used throughout the old testament (Tanakh) by both Moses and the Prophets and is the most exhaustive and unique rendition of its kind in the world. Over 5 years in the making, this English rendition reveals every place the Hebrew Aleph Tav symbol was used as a \\\"free standing\\\" character symbol believed to express the \\\"strength of the covenant\\\" in its original meaning.
